nodes.name: Definition of pair0
nodes.english: Something is a pair if and only if it is an ordered pair of two elements

nodes.name: Pair elements structure
nodes.fol: (forall (p x y) (if (pair p x y) (and (first x p)(second y p))))
nodes.english: If p is the pair <x,y>, then x is the first element of p and y is the second element of p

nodes.name: Pair equality
nodes.fol: (forall (p1 x1 y1 p2 x2 y2) (if (or (pair p1 x1 y1)(pair p2 x2 y2)) (iff (equal p1 p2) (and (pair p1 x1 y1)(pair p2 x2 y2) (equal x1 x2)(equal y1 y2)))))
nodes.english: Two pairs are equal exactly when their first elements are equal and their second elements are equal

nodes.name: Pair uniqueness
nodes.fol: (forall (p x1 x2 y1 y2) (if (and (pair p x1 y1)(pair p x2 y2)) (and (equal x1 x2)(equal y1 y2))))
nodes.english: The first and second elements of a pair are unique

nodes.name: Definition of function0
nodes.fol: (forall (f s1 s2) (iff (function0 f s1 s2) (and (set s1)(set s2)(set f) (forall (p) (if (member p f) (exists (x y) (and (member x s1)(member y s2) (pair p x y))))) (forall (x) (if (member x s1) (exists (p) (and (member p f)(first x p))))) (forall (p1 p2 x) (if (and (first x p1)(first x p2) (member p1 f)(member p2 f)) (equal p1 p2))) (forall (y) (if (member y s2) (exists (p) (and (member p f)(second y p))))))))
nodes.english: A function f from set s1 onto set s2 is a set of pairs where each element of s1 occurs exactly once as first element, and every element of s2 occurs as second element of at least one pair

nodes.name: Function domain
nodes.fol: (forall (f s1 s2) (if (function0 f s1 s2)(domain s1 f)))
nodes.english: If f is a function from s1 to s2, then s1 is the domain of f

nodes.name: Function range
nodes.fol: (forall (f s1 s2) (if (function0 f s1 s2)(range s2 f)))
nodes.english: If f is a function from s1 to s2, then s2 is the range of f

nodes.name: Function mapping
nodes.fol: (forall (f x y) (iff (map f x y) (exists (s1 s2 p) (and (function0 f s1 s2)(member p f) (first x p)(second y p)))))
nodes.english: Function f maps x to y when the pair <x,y> is a member of f; f(x) = y

nodes.name: Skolem function correspondence
nodes.fol: (forall (y1 y x1 x e s1 s2) (if (and (skfct y1 y x1 x e)(typelt x s1)(rangeFd s2 y x e)) (exists (f) (and (function0 f s1 s2) (forall (p) (iff (pair p x1 y1)(member p f)))))))
nodes.english: When we have a Skolem function, we have a corresponding mathematical function

nodes.name: Definition of integer intervals
nodes.fol: (forall (s n1 n2) (iff (ints s n1 n2) (and (posInteger n1)(posInteger n2)(set s) (forall (n) (iff (member n s) (and (posInteger n)(leq n1 n)(leq n n2)))))))
nodes.english: s is the set of all positive integers from n1 to n2, including n1 and n2

nodes.name: Definition of sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (s) (iff (sequence s) (exists (s1 s2 n) (and (function0 s s1 s2)(ints s1 1 n)))))
nodes.english: A sequence of length n is a function whose domain is the first n positive integers

nodes.name: Definition of sequence length
nodes.fol: (forall (n s) (if (sequence s) (iff (length n s) (exists (s1 s2) (and (function0 s s1 s2)(ints s1 1 n))))))
nodes.english: The length of a sequence is the upper bound of its domain interval

nodes.name: nth element of sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (s n y) (if (sequence s) (iff (nth y n s)(map s n y))))
nodes.english: The nth element in a sequence is the entity that n is mapped to by the function

nodes.name: First element of sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (s y) (if (sequence s) (iff (first y s)(nth y 1 s))))
nodes.english: The first element of a sequence is the nth element where n is 1

nodes.name: Rest of sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (s1 s) (iff (rest s1 s) (and (sequence s)(sequence s1) (forall (i x) (iff (map s1 i x) (exists (j) (and (posInteger i)(successor j i) (map s j x))))))))
nodes.english: The rest of a sequence is the sequence that remains after the first element is removed

nodes.name: Last element of sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (s y n) (if (and (sequence s)(length n s)) (iff (last y s)(nth y n s))))
nodes.english: The last element of a sequence is the nth element where n is the length of the sequence

nodes.name: Element membership in sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (x s) (iff (inSeq x s) (exists (n) (nth x n s))))
nodes.english: An entity is in a sequence if it is the nth element of the sequence for some n

nodes.name: Before relation in sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (x y s) (iff (beforeInSeq x y s) (exists (n1 n2) (and (sequence s)(nth x n1 s)(nth y n2 s) (lt n1 n2)))))
nodes.english: If one element's position n is less than another's, it is before the other in the sequence

nodes.name: Successive elements in sequence
nodes.fol: (forall (x1 x2 s) (iff (successiveElts x1 x2 s) (exists (n1 n2) (and (successor n2 n1)(nth x1 n1 s)(nth x2 n2 s)))))
nodes.english: Two elements are successive in a sequence if their positions are consecutive integers

node_types.variable: Frequently used variables (2+ axioms in chapter)
